alert.note: Alert for Butler; Cowley; Marion (Kansas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Red Flag Warning issued April 07 at 3:03AM CDT until April 07 at 8:00PM CDT by NWS Wichita
info.description: ...RED FLAG WARNING IN EFFECT FROM NOON TODAY TO 8 PM CDT THIS EVENING FOR EXTREME GRASSLAND FIRE DANGER FOR FIRE WEATHER ZONES 052...069 AND 093... The National Weather Service in Wichita has issued a Red Flag Warning for extreme grassland fire danger, which is in effect from noon today to 8 PM CDT this evening. * Extreme Grassland Fire Danger...Is forecast. * Winds...Northwest 30 to 35 mph with gusts up to 45 mph. * Relative Humidity...As low as 23 percent. * Impacts...Any fires that develop will likely spread rapidly and become very difficult to control. Outdoor burning is not recommended.
info.instruction: A red flag warning means that critical fire weather conditions are either occurring now, or will shortly. A combination of strong winds, low relative humidity and warm temperatures can contribute to extreme fire behavior. Please advise the appropriate officials or fire crews in the field of this fire weather product.
